channel.title: Player Name containing something

item.title: Player Name containing something
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

I typed this up:

if (playerName.startsWith("Mod") && playerRights <= 0) { sendMessage("Banned. Come back without mod in your name,"); sendMessage("Or get unbanned and modded, then log back in."); disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); }

But that only prevents them from having mod at the beginning of their name. I can and will make it for having mod in your name, But how would I prevent them from having a name like ‘I Mod You’ - containing the word mod?

Read full topic
